Class JsonCardParsing

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.JsonCardParsing
public class JsonCardParsing extends Object
JsonCardParsing is class,that actually converts Json Strings (using Json) into actual Card Class

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    JsonCardParsing()
    Constructor of JsonCardParsing,it builds all Card present in Game
